senses.sense_definition: A person, especially a child, who cries or complains easily, often about trivial matters.

examples.text: Don't be such a <w>crybaby</w> just because you lost the game.
He acted like a <w>crybaby</w> when he didn't get the gift he wanted.

senses.sense_definition: A baby who cries much more than is normal.

examples.text: The tired parents struggled to soothe their <w>crybaby</w> throughout the night.
She was a <w>crybaby</w> as an infant, but she became very calm as she grew older.

senses.sense_definition: To act like a <w>crybaby</w> by complaining or crying immaturely.

examples.text: He <w>crybabied</w> to the referee about the foul until he received a warning.
Instead of fixing the mistake, she just <w>crybabied</w> about how unfair it was.
